entry.title: LearnVFX Acquisition
entry.summary: LearnVFX.com has been acquired by FullMeta Corp. (Creators of MetaPipe.com). To celebrate, we are giving away a free book, Pipeline 101
entry.content:
FullMeta Corp., the creators of MetaPipe.com have acquired LearnVFX.com, my former training company. LearnVFX will become our portal for providing training and cool content for the VFX and animation community.

To celebrate we’ve decided to give away my latest creation, Pipeline 101, a free crash course book on VFX and animation pipelines. Feel free to share the link below. Pipeline 101 is for anyone interested in how C.G. animation and VFX studios work under the hood. Did I mention it’s free?

Grab your free copy here: Pipeline 101
